hero.title: Yudo Pi Maler ne Jok Turkana
hero.subtitle: Nong sokni pi machiegni kodi kendo ikonyi jou mondo odhi maber gi yudo pi maler

about.missionText1: Water Access Turkana ochiw tich mar loso map kod pogo kama sokni pi nitiere e Kaunti mar Turkana, Kenya. Jowa konyo jok mondo ginong sokni pi maler machiegni mogik, momiyo kinde mar wuoth odok manok kendo konyo mondo iyud pi mabeyo.
about.missionText2: Wagoyo tich tir gi jok machiegni mondo mi paro ma kare kendo manyien momiyo jodalago teko mar yudo pi maler maber.
about.locationDesc: Maps ma inyalo goyo kod tich manenore kama sokni pi nitiere e Turkana
about.communityDesc: Konyo jodalago gana alufu mondo ginong sokni pi machiegni gi utegi
about.cleanWaterDesc: Jiwo yudo pi makare kendo maler ni madho kod tich pile ka pile

challenges.title: Chandruok Ma Watiyogo
challenges.scarcityDesc: Kaunti mar Turkana nigi chandruok maduong mar pi onge, ka koth tin kendo sokni pi bor momiyo yudo pi pile ka pile bedo matek.
challenges.travelDesc: Jok mangeny nyaka wuoth kilometa mangeny mondo ginong pi, kendo mano tiyo gi kinde kod teko mabeyo.
challenges.infoDesc: Onge weche moriwore kuom kama sokni pi nitiere ma kelo chandruok ne jok mondo ginong pi machiegni mogik.

impact.title: Kaka Watimo
impact.travelDesc: Konyo jok mondo gigweth seche mangeny pile ka pile ka ginong sokni pi machiegni mogik
impact.empowermentDesc: Chiwo weche ma inyalo yudo momiyo jok teko mar kawo chandruok matimo weche
impact.healthDesc: Yudo pi maler maber konyo medo ngima kod dak maber

map.title: Piny Turkana
map.description: Nong piny Turkana kendo ine kama sokni pi wa nitiere

cta.title: Iseikori Mondo Inong Sokni Pi?
cta.description: Nong map wa ma inyalo goyo kod tich mondo inong sokni pi machiegni kodi

contact.title: Tudre Kodwa
contact.subtitle: In kod penjo kata idwaro konyo? Dwabiro winjo iri.
contact.formDesc: Pong gi form manie piny kendo wabiro dwoki e kinde mar saa 24.
contact.name: Nying
contact.subject: Wach
contact.errorDesc: Ok onyal oro ote. Tem kendo.

waterSources.title: Sokni Pi e Turkana
waterSources.subtitle: Nong sokni pi maler machiegni kodi
waterSources.mapTitle: Map Ma Inyalo Goyo Kod Tich

footer.description: Loso map kod pogo kama sokni pi nitiere e Kaunti mar Turkana mondo jok oyud pi maler maber.

weather.title: Kaka Yamb Biro Bedo
weather.description: Kaka yamb nitie kawuono e Kaunti mar Turkana
